title: LeaveBuster
body: So Im kinda new to the game and i recently got leavebuster Because my comptuer suck and i wonder if someone can help me with this problem

replies.body: Welcome to League!  [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) is a system that will place players in a lower priority after multiple leaves, and not just one game.  The only way to restore your standing with the system would be through playing without interruptions.  I'd like to help out with that, but need more information on the issue you're having.  Let me know in detail!
